children.name: a
children.sourceText: Believest thou that there is a God?

children.name: all
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: another
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: as
children.sourceText: Behold, assuredly as thou livest, O king, there is a God.

children.name: before
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: down
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: he
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: him
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: his
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: if
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth.

children.name: o
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: of
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: on
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: our
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: out
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: that
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: the
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: there
children.sourceText: Believest thou that there is a God?

children.name: this
children.sourceText: Believest thou this?

children.name: thou
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: thy
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: to
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: unto
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: we
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: which
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: whom
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: will
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: yea
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth.
